EVJ.A: The global maximum heat value is {0.52}.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Beauty and Inventory or the cell corresponding to Books and Marketplace?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Beauty} and {Inventory} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Books and Online or the cell corresponding to Electronics and Subscription?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Electronics} and {Subscription} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Home Goods and Marketplace or the cell corresponding to Toys and Marketplace?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Home Goods} and {Marketplace} has a higher heat value.
